titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I wrote sermons during the morning. We went into Durham, where Clayton & I lunched with the Bishop of Jarrow, Ella & Fearne with Mrs Moore. We all attended the rendering of Bach's Oratorio in the Cathedral. After tea, we all returned to Auckland, giving Jimmie Dobbie a lift back to Spennymoor.
